title: Chicken tikka wraps
ingredients: ['300g natural yoghurt', '3 tablespoons tikka curry paste', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '600g skinless chicken breast fillets, cubed', '2 little gem lettuces, chopped (or iceberg)', '1/2 red onion, peeled and thinly sliced', '5cm piece cucumber, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '4 naan breads, chapatis or pitta breads', 'cucumber and mint raita, to serve']
